Dogs.productName: Reddy Navy Durable Dog Leash, 6 ft.
Dogs.productInfo: The Reddy Navy Durable Leash fits the part for constant adventuring. Whether you're headed to the mountains or trekking through the city, this collar steers you and your furry sidekick in the trend-right direction with its exclusive rubber-like material and reinforced nylon core that's ultra-durable, water-resistant, and easy to clean. A detachable handle padding has a good grip on comfort that'll come in handy as the two of you seize every day together.
Dogs.productInfo2: D-ring provides a convenient place to attach waste bag dispensers, flashlights and other dog walk must-haves. Gear them up in long-lasting style from head to paw by matching this leash up with the Reddy Navy Durable Collar
Dogs.productSummery: what a nice leash look at that so cool

Dogs.productInfo: The Good2Go Tie-Dye Dog Collar gets your pup ready to dip out in free-spirited style. Crafted of durable webbed nylon that's long lasting, this dog collar easily adjusts to provide the perfect fit. They'll feel comfy and cool on the daily, especially when you hook their look up with the matching Good2Go Tie-Dye Dog Leash.

Dogs.productName: Benebone Bacon Flavored Wishbone Chew Toy, Small
Dogs.productInfo: At Benebone, we started with the premise that dogs experience scent and flavor in a way we can't even grasp. So, we ditched the neon colors and loud squeaks. Inspired by the dog's powerful sense of smell, we developed a long-lasting durable chew that's jam-packed with real flavor. Once your dog takes a bite of our USA-made chews, he'll be hooked.

Cats.productName: Pusheen Sunglasses Cuddler Bed for Cats
Cats.productInfo: This round Pusheen pet bed is a super soft resting spot, perfect for cat naps. High foam sides give your cat a feeling of security. Fleece lining provides a warm and cozy napping spot. Includes a double-sided pillow with a fleece side and a plush side, which can be turned over according to your style or your cat's preference. Details include embroidered cool Pusheen with sunglasses. Lined with grips to prevent slipping

Cats.productName: You & Me Sisal Cat Scratching Post
Cats.productInfo: You & Me Sisal Cat Scratching Post, Grey, 18.75" .Promotes a healthy place for scratching. Made from durable sisal material. Helps satisfy the urge to claw

Cats.productInfo: The Harmony Black and Buffalo Check Hooded Igloo Cat Bed is a cavern of coziness for felines who prefer some privacy when they rest. Food.productInfo: Our venison dog snacks are quite simply USDA certified, restaurant grade venison top round. We slice it thin (comes out like a thick crispy potato chip) and dehydrate it in our own ovens in Southern California every week. It's a very special snack for your very special dog!

Food.productName: Blue Buffalo Wilderness Natural Dog Food
Food.productInfo: BLUE Wilderness Adult Dry Dog Food is made with more of the meat they love to satisfy the spirit of the wolf in every dog. This Grain Free recipe features a precise balance of carbohydrates and calories to support your dog's daily dietary needs. BLUE Wilderness dog food is a product of the Blue Buffalo company. Based in the United States, Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods featuring real meat, fruit and vegetables.

Food.productName: Royal Canin Feline Health Wet Kitten Food
Food.productInfo: At around 4 months old, a kitten's growth rate changes. With rising energy levels, developing immune and digestive systems, growing bones and muscles, and emerging teeth, older kittens have different needs than they did as a baby cat (1-4 months old). Royal Canin Thin Slices in Gravy Wet Food delivers the nutritional precision your kitten needs to reach their most magnificent potential.
